Data Structures

struct  Persist

Detailed Description

Time is used to represent a time value consisting of hours, minutes and seconds.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum Time::Format
 

Allowed formats for string representation of a Time.

Enumerator:
TimeHM  hour, minutes
TimeHMS  hour, minutes, seconds
